description:
Ultralight and body mapped to optimise breathability and mobility in the saddle, these quick-wicking liner shorts feature a low-profile, cushioning chamois for comfort over long distances.
When you’re clocking miles in the saddle, you need liner shorts that will give you complete freedom of movement, encourage airflow and keep you comfortable over long distances. Our innovative take on the liner short uses three carefully selected body-mapped fabrics to give you ventilation where you need it, quick-wicking support, and superb mobility so you can break new ground.

The men’s-specific, Elastic Interface® Gravel Performance chamois provides low-bulk cushioning to protect sensitive areas. Clever details keep you comfortable, including the high-stretch Flexile™ 200 waistband and the seamless inner thigh, which reduces the potential for rubbing. Silicone grips on the lower hem and raised centre back keep the shorts in place as you hammer down a rocky descent. For refuelling on the go, keep snacks stashed away in the easy-reach thigh pockets.

Made with airy, open mesh fabric, these lightweight liner shorts offer unbeatable breathability and are ideal for layering every time you ride.
name: Rab Cinder Liner Shorts - Mens
